DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Huaier ( Trametes robiniophila Murr ) traditional Chinese medicine , widely use China many year . The investigator previous study report Huaier could exert great inhibitory effect breast cancer cell vitro vivo . PURPOSE : To evaluate efficacy safety Huaier Granule treat woman triple negative breast cancer surgically remove .
DOC.brief_title: Huaier Granule Treating Women With Triple Negative Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Compare disease-free survival ( DFS ) overall survival ( OS ) patient triple negative breast cancer randomize adjuvant Huaier Granule group vs. randomize Blank-control group . OUTLINE : Patients randomize follow one two treatment group follow annually . Arm I : Patients take Huaier Granule adjuvant treatment triple negative breast cancer surgically remove . Arm II : Patients take Huaier Granule triple negative breast cancer surgically remove .
DOC.criteria: Age : ≥ 18 ≤ 75 year , female ; Triple negative breast cancer surgically remove ; The triple negative breast cancer confirm pathological examination Immunohistochemistry ( IHC ) ; Not receive preoperative anticancer drug ; The liver kidney function satisfies follow condition within 3 day surgery ( exclude day 3 ) : aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) , glutamicoxalacetic transaminase ( ALT ) < 2 upper limit normal ( ULN ) , total bilirubin ≤ 1.5 ULN , serum creatinine < 1.5 ULN ; Other laboratory test meet following requirement within 3 day surgery ( exclude day 3 ) : Hb ≥ 90g/l , platelet count ≥ 100×109/L , absolute neutrophil count > 1.5×109/L ; The expect survival time ≥ 6 month ; The subject volunteer sign inform consent .
